Package org.hibernate.tool.schema.extract.spi

Interface ColumnTypeInformation

All Known Subinterfaces:
ColumnInformation
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggregateColumn, Column, ColumnInformationImpl
@Incubating public interface ColumnTypeInformation
Provides access to information about existing table columns

  • Method Details

    • getNullable

      Boolean getNullable()
      Is the column nullable?

      The database is allowed to report unknown, hence the use of Boolean.

      Returns:
      nullability, if known
